channel.title: Login Problems
channel.description:
Ok, I have made my server off a All-star Base, and when I log in its fine, but when my brother tries to log on with a different computer (same connection) it doesn't allow him?
We have tried both localhost and no-ip addresses and none have worked, please help.

item.title: Login Problems
item.dc:creator: @loggedout loggedout
item.description:
@loggedout wrote:

have you port forwarded? if not port forward then try and i hope you have good luck in the future.

Read full topic
